description: Part single-storey rear extension, part first-floor rear extension and part mansard roof extension, to provide additional commercial floor area at ground floor and residential floor area at first and second floor level, reconfigured access to flat from No. 33, external alterations to front and rear facades, including changes to the existing windows.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawing/plan titles: U-AK-PP001 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), U-AK-PP002 (Proposed Roof Plan), U-AK-PP002 (Proposed Floorplans), U-AK-PE001 (Proposed Section), all dated 26/01/2018.
Reason: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing property.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).
| No part of any roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995, no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with policies 4.1, 4.8, 5.5, 5.9 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, Plan for the Environment (2004).
